report.name: x_synthFICompta

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select:
SELECT RPAD(s.PID, 4, ' ') pid, RPAD(NVL(l.PNOM,' '),30,' ') pnom, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(l.TYPPROJ),' '),7,'0') typ_ligne, RPAD(NVL(l.ASTATUT,' '),1,' ') astatut, RPAD(NVL(l.ICPI,' '),5,' ') icpi, RPAD(NVL(pi.ILIBEL,' '),50,' ') ilibel, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(pi.CADA),' '),6,'0') cada, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(l.DPCODE),'0'),5,'0') dpcode, RPAD(NVL(dp.DPLIB,' '),50,' ') dplib, RPAD(NVL(l.CLICODE,' '), 5, ' ') clicode, RPAD(NVL(cm.CLILIB,' '),25,' ') clilib, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(s.CODCAMO),' '),6,'0') codcamo, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(l.CODSG),' '),7,'0') codsg, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(s.CAFI),' '),6,'0') cafi, RPAD(NVL(ca.CLIBRCA,' '),16,' ') clibrca, RPAD(NVL(s.RTYPE,' '),1,' ') rtype, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOJHFT_DEC, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOJHFT_DEC, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOFTENV_DEC, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOFTENV_DEC, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.CONSOENV_DEC, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') CONSOENV_DEC, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOJHFT_N, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOJHFT_N, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOFTENV_N, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOFTENV_N, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.CONSOENV_N, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') CONSOENV_N, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.CONSOTOTAL, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') CONSOTOTAL, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOJHFTENV_MOIS, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOJHFTENV_MOIS, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOFTENV_MOIS, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOFTENV_MOIS, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.CONSOENV_MOIS, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') CONSOENV_MOIS, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.IMMOCONSOJH_MOIS, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') IMMOCONSOJH_MOIS, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.IMMOCONSO_MOIS, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') IMMOCONSO_MOIS, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.IMMOCONSOJH_N, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') IMMOCONSOJH_N, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.IMMOCONSO_N, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') IMMOCONSO_N FROM SYNTHESE_FIN_COMPTA s, LIGNE_BIP l, PROJ_INFO pi, DOSSIER_PROJET dp, CLIENT_MO cm, CENTRE_ACTIVITE ca WHERE l.PID=s.PID AND pi.ICPI=l.ICPI AND dp.DPCODE=l.DPCODE AND cm.CLICODE=l.CLICODE AND ca.CODCAMO=s.CAFI AND l.codcamo != '77777' &P_WHERE UNION SELECT RPAD(s.PID, 4, ' ') pid, RPAD(NVL(l.PNOM,' '),30,' ') pnom, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(l.TYPPROJ),' '),7,'0') typ_ligne, RPAD(NVL(l.ASTATUT,' '),1,' ') astatut, RPAD(NVL(l.ICPI,' '),5,' ') icpi, RPAD(NVL(pi.ILIBEL,' '),50,' ') ilibel, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(pi.CADA),' '),6,'0') cada, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(l.DPCODE),'0'),5,'0') dpcode, RPAD(NVL(dp.DPLIB,' '),50,' ') dplib, RPAD(NVL(rp.CLICODE,l.CLICODE), 5, ' ') clicode, RPAD(NVL(cm.CLILIB,' '),25,' ') clilib, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(s.CODCAMO),' '),6,'0') codcamo, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(l.CODSG),' '),7,'0') codsg, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(s.CAFI),' '),6,'0') cafi, RPAD(NVL(ca.CLIBRCA,' '),16,' ') clibrca, RPAD(NVL(s.RTYPE,' '),1,' ') rtype, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOJHFT_DEC, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOJHFT_DEC, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOFTENV_DEC, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOFTENV_DEC, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.CONSOENV_DEC, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') CONSOENV_DEC, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOJHFT_N, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOJHFT_N, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOFTENV_N, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOFTENV_N, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.CONSOENV_N, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') CONSOENV_N, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.CONSOTOTAL, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') CONSOTOTAL, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOJHFTENV_MOIS, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOJHFTENV_MOIS, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOFTENV_MOIS, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOFTENV_MOIS, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.CONSOENV_MOIS, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') CONSOENV_MOIS, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.IMMOCONSOJH_MOIS, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') IMMOCONSOJH_MOIS, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.IMMOCONSO_MOIS, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') IMMOCONSO_MOIS, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.IMMOCONSOJH_N, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') IMMOCONSOJH_N, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.IMMOCONSO_N, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') IMMOCONSO_N FROM SYNTHESE_FIN_COMPTA s, LIGNE_BIP l, PROJ_INFO pi, DOSSIER_PROJET dp, CLIENT_MO cm, CENTRE_ACTIVITE ca, ( select rp.* from REPARTITION_LIGNE rp, datdebex dx where ( dx.moismens between rp.datdeb and rp.datfin-1) OR ( dx.moismens >= rp.datdeb and rp.datfin is null) ) rp
WHERE l.PID=s.PID AND pi.ICPI=l.ICPI AND dp.DPCODE=l.DPCODE AND cm.CLICODE=NVL(rp.CLICODE,l.CLICODE) AND ca.CODCAMO=s.CAFI AND s.CODCAMO = rp.CODCAMO(+) AND s.pid = rp.pid(+) AND l.CODCAMO = '77777' &P_WHERE UNION SELECT RPAD(s.PID, 4, ' ') pid, RPAD(NVL(l.PNOM,' '),30,' ') pnom, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(l.TYPPROJ),' '),7,'0') typ_ligne, RPAD(NVL(l.ASTATUT,' '),1,' ') astatut, RPAD(NVL(l.ICPI,' '),5,' ') icpi, RPAD(NVL(pi.ILIBEL,' '),50,' ') ilibel, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(pi.CADA),' '),6,'0') cada, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(l.DPCODE),'0'),5,'0') dpcode, RPAD(NVL(dp.DPLIB,' '),50,' ') dplib, DECODE(l.clicode,NULL,NULL,NULL) clicode, DECODE(cm.CLILIB,NULL,NULL,NULL) clilib, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(s.CODCAMO),' '),6,'0') codcamo, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(l.CODSG),' '),7,'0') codsg, LPAD(NVL(TO_CHAR(s.CAFI),' '),6,'0') cafi, RPAD(NVL(ca.CLIBRCA,' '),16,' ') clibrca, RPAD(NVL(s.RTYPE,' '),1,' ') rtype, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOJHFT_DEC, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOJHFT_DEC, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOFTENV_DEC, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOFTENV_DEC, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.CONSOENV_DEC, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') CONSOENV_DEC, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOJHFT_N, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOJHFT_N, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOFTENV_N, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOFTENV_N, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.CONSOENV_N, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') CONSOENV_N, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.CONSOTOTAL, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') CONSOTOTAL, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOJHFTENV_MOIS, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOJHFTENV_MOIS, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.NCONSOFTENV_MOIS, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') NCONSOFTENV_MOIS, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.CONSOENV_MOIS, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') CONSOENV_MOIS, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.IMMOCONSOJH_MOIS, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') IMMOCONSOJH_MOIS, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.IMMOCONSO_MOIS, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') IMMOCONSO_MOIS, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.IMMOCONSOJH_N, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') IMMOCONSOJH_N, LPAD (NVL (TO_CHAR(s.IMMOCONSO_N, 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,00'), 13, ' ') IMMOCONSO_N FROM SYNTHESE_FIN_COMPTA s, LIGNE_BIP l, PROJ_INFO pi, DOSSIER_PROJET dp, CLIENT_MO cm, CENTRE_ACTIVITE ca WHERE l.PID=s.PID AND pi.ICPI=l.ICPI AND dp.DPCODE=l.DPCODE AND cm.CLICODE=l.CLICODE AND ca.CODCAMO=s.CAFI AND s.CODCAMO = '77777' AND l.codcamo = '77777' &P_WHERE ;

function.name: afterpform
p_perimclivalidtrigger
